content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
SELECT name, location from sys.external_data_sources


SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS result


SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
) AS result

SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDQUOTE = '"'
    --#ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
) AS result


SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'vendor.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDQUOTE = '"'
    --#ESCAPECHAR = '\\'
) AS result
